meanings.definition: To dress in a more stylish or fashionable manner than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys outdressing her friends at parties.
meanings.sent2: He always tries to outdress his colleagues at work.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, she ended up outdressing everyone with her creative outfit.
meanings.sent4: Her sense of style outdresses everyone else in the room.
meanings.sent5: Outdressing others makes her feel confident and happy.

meanings.definition: To surpass in dressing or attire.
meanings.sent1: The fashionista loves outdressing everyone at events.
meanings.sent2: He managed to outdress his siblings for the family photo.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be outdressing the dog in their little outfits.
meanings.sent4: Her elegance outdresses any competition in the fashion industry.
meanings.sent5: Outdressing in formal wear is his specialty.
